name: Mustang Survival VIBE Harmonized Foam Pull Over PFD - Unisex
description: Flexible and low-profile, the Vibe PFD offers comfort and a range of motion for whitewater paddling or SUPing. Safety features include a whistle, reflective trim, and rear loops and attachment point that are compatible with SUP leash release belts when river-running.200-denier nylon shell is lightweight, quick-drying and durable.Adjustable neoprene-padded shoulder straps.Over-the-head entry with Z-Strap cinch adjustment system fits comfortably and securely.Front tunnel and zippered mesh pockets store gear.Back attachment point allows towing.Rear daisy chain gear loops.Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard.
